name: Steven
bio: Steven is the co-founder & chief operational officer on the team. He has been a clarinetist for 13 years with 350k+ following on social media. Before co-founding Overture Games, he was the founder of HPMS Ventures. His favorite artist is Martin Frost.

name: Mercedes
bio: Mercedes is the lead frontend engineer and a founding member on the team. She has been playing piano for over 15 years and has passionately worked on games for over 7 years. She is currently a student at Northwestern University studying mathematics and computer science. Her favorite artist is Fall Out Boy.

name: Jack
bio: Jack is the lead systems developer and has been with Overture since its inception. He's not a musician, but he tries his best. Jack is a fourth-year student at Northwestern University, studying computer science and working on games on the side. One of his favorite artists is Childish Gambino.
